plays.text: Goal scored by Mathieu Schneider assisted by Adam Deadmarsh and Bryan Smolinski

Penalty to Sean Hill 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Kelly Buchberger assisted by Aaron Miller and Jason Allison
